General.Name: Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited
General.Description: Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in steel conduits for electrical wiring systems in Thailand. It provides steel pipings for construction and real estate businesses. The company was formerly known as Daiwa Industry Company Limited and changed its name to Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited in February 2016. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Samut Prakarn, Thailand.
General.Address: 999/9, 10, 11 Moo 9 Soi Pornpattana, Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10290
